EmailTemplate.name: Order Fulfillment Product Delivered
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Five Star Professional HEAT index social post has been published!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}:
A new social post has been published for you! Please check out your new post online and share it directly to your network to optimize the views and interactions.
Your post can be viewed here: {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Additionally, we encourage you to share the following announcement email with your clients and network. Just copy/paste the content below into an email or other digital announcement platform to share.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to your Client Success Representative, {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Fullname__c}, at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Phone__c} or by email at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Email__c}.
Thank you, Five Star Professional Client Success Team
___________________________
One of the reasons {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c} were recognized as Five Star award winners was a demonstrated knowledge of the industry.
An important part of being successful professionals in the industry is keeping on top of market trends and market health. As {!Fulfillment__c.Associated_With__c} award winners, this team has access to exclusive information charting the direction of the local market!
The Real Estate HEAT Index offers insight into what is happening now in the real estate market in {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Region__c}. It also gives valuable clues as to the direction the market is going in the future, which gives homebuyers and sellers important insights to use when making their decisions!
You can take a peek at this month's Real Estate HEAT Index here!
{!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Jonathan Wesser Five Star Professional VP, Research
